comments:
RC2 -- I turned off CVS decorators, then did some work including creating a new
class, then reenabled CVS decorators, which produced the attached NPE.  Note,
decorators did display.

This is another case of an unexpected null showing up in the result from 
Tree.getChildren().
This is fixed in the latest (> 20030310).
Approved by Mike and Veronika for RC3.
